p:
A total of 10 7 TCID 50 of influenza challenge virus was delivered intranasally as previously described
22 . All participants were required to remain in isolation for approximately 10 days. Participants were discharged on day 7 post-challenge if they were afebrile, were clinically and hemodynamically stable, and had two negative diagnostic tests for influenza on consecutive days. Participants attended follow-up visits on days 35 and 63.
